name: What It Is Like to Be a Goldfish
name_original: What It Is Like to Be a Goldfish
description: What It Is Like to Be a Goldfish is a metaphorical estimation of the inner life of a goldfish with an absurdist approach to the notion of radical otherness. Take a shallow dive and explore a miniature world in this first-person goldfish simulator inspired by Thomas Nagel's essay, "What Is It Like to Be a Bat?"
